TopicTitle: Ksp is now playable for me again!

Articles.Content:
Just built a new PC and the specs blow this tiny 32 bit game away.

I cant describe how happy I felt when I could make a 247 part rocket and have playable FPS.![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

PS: just wondering if there was any part you would add to your PC or replace what would it be.

Well since you're asking, I do admit that a graphics card would be nice. Intel HD is good, but I do envy those people with five monitors and 239874293x239847 screen resolution who can run modern games at 99999 FPS xD
I can't really go super heavy builds without having lag. The biggest thing I have is 262 parts, and it drops the timer to 68% normal speed.

Congratulations!

Want to put your rig to the limit?

>

.craft files are in the descriptions ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
What would I upgrade? The PC. Most of its components are out of date.
